page.title: 22Leisure and Recreation
page.content:
A New Village hall was built in 2008,where many activites are held such as :

Indoor Bowling,Belly Dancing,Ballet Classes,P.E Sessions for the Primary School pupils,yoga and meetings.A Lunch Club is held once a month for pensioners where soup and sandwiches are served. Football is run by Roger Hutchison for local children. Youth Club is open for children on a Friday night for children in P7 and up.They play different games and if the weather is nice,they do outdoor activites
Contribution by: Amy P7
